about_the_game:
What is Smash Slug?

  • It is a party game with 4-12 players.
  • Each team member chooses an agent for himself and tries to stop the killers by fulfilling the duties of these agents.
  • There is a time limit for the reactor to self-destruct, you must complete all the missions before this time expires and not be caught by the killer who will try to stop you.
  • Don't forget; Every decision you make is very important. Before you eliminate a strategic agent, you must make sure he is not innocent.

ACTUALLY, WE ARE ALL TEAM MEMBERS

Yes, all members have different abilities and duties. You must get the station's reactor completely clean before it explodes. But there are also malicious members among you who will try to stop you. Remember, the decision you make in each vote is very important, wrong decisions can completely change the progress of the game.


ONE OF US IN A KILLER

One of us is a killer. You have to be extremely careful when figuring out who he is. Because he will try all ways not to be exposed. You should stay together as much as possible and carry out tasks together. When you're alone, you have to watch your back.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 2GB / AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB

short_description: Smash Slug is a 4-12 player party game. Each player tries to survive by doing the tasks assigned to him. Watch out for killers who have infiltrated your team and will do anything to stop you.
